snippet: The Obama administration is confident of an increase despite increases in the costs of premiums and several major insurers leaving....
abstract: Obama administration expects increased enrollment in Affordable Care Act marketplace in 2017; upbeat news comes amid criticism over spike in premiums, loss of major insurers and ongoing challenges to law from Republican lawmakers.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is confident of an increase despite increases in the costs of premiums and several major insurers leaving.

headline.main: As Health Markets Struggle, 9% Average Rise in Enrollment Is Predicted
headline.print_headline: White House Predicts Rise in Health Market Sign-Ups

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
